svg.text: Overview: What Does the Network Predict?
✓ Most common ✓ Works well at high noise ✗ Can struggle at low noise
✓ Intuitive ✓ Good at low noise ✗ Can be unstable at high noise
✓ Balanced across all noise levels ✓ Better for distillation ✓ Numerically stable
4. Visual Comparison: When to Use Each?
Diffusion Theory - Parameterization | What Should the Network Predict?
